column4: I would not do it after the systems booted unless it's like Chousuke said, it's a hot swapable setup.
Well, you dont need the boot manager for the LiveCD, but does the drive allow you to get to the LiveCD?
That sounds more like a physical fault v.s. a BM fault.
Intel MX25 SSD or the Micron SLC
That doesn't sound right though angrynerd .. normally if the MBR is hosed up, the CD will still fire up.
How to run the trim function?
Is there a package with tools?
Just getting to know how it will affect my day
Oh I don't know... not into it that far. Just used a friends box the other day that had a pair of the SLC's in it, man the thing was fast !!
I ordered a  couple last week for another project, so will be testing over the next few weeks.
